thread.title: Heidi Klum in No Makeup, Gaga’s New Tattoo + More Grammys Get-Ready Instagrams

title: Heidi Klum in No Makeup, Gaga’s New Tattoo + More Grammys Get-Ready Instagrams
text: Share Ever wonder what really goes into the flawless looks that hit the Grammys red carpet? There are lots of bells and whistles that celebs usually keep under wraps, but thanks to the rise of Instagram, many stars are now letting us in on their secrets. Here’s our roundup of all the weird, wild, and beautiful ways the stars got red carpet ready. Heidi Klum reminded us that she’s gorgeous before and after her glam squad’s magic touch. Demi Lovato wasn’t sure what type of mani her look called for, so she was ready with three sets, just in case. Taraji P. Henson made sure her body was as glowy and dewy as her cheekbones, using everybody’s favorite highlighter, Glossier’s Haloscope, on her shoulders. Lady Gaga will perform with Metallica, and she donned some faux ink as a nod to Metallica’s new single, “Moth Into Flame.” Lea Michele teased her pink eye makeup in a sultry pic in bed with Brad Goreski, co-host of Fashion Police. Paris Jackson took over CR Fashion Book’s Instagram story, prepping to announce The Weeknd with an eye mask. Paris Jackson on Instagram stories. (Photo: CR Fashion Book/Instagram) More Kris Jenner hit the red carpet early, snapping her arrival, cherry blossom filter and all. Katy Perry teased her white mani and decked-out fingers before hitting the red carpet. Heidi Klum reminded us that she’s gorgeous before and after her glam squad’s magic touch. Carrie Underwood stayed the night before the Grammys, prepping her skin with mask and red wine TLC. Britney Spears showed off her tiny naked dress pre-hair and makeup. Let’s keep in touch! Follow Yahoo Beauty on Facebook , Twitter , Instagram , and Pinterest .
